titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate regarding the importance of oral health, and for other purposes.
A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate regarding the importance of oral health, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Declares that access to oral health care services and the prevention of oral health care disease is integral to achieving and maintaining good health.
Recognizes the Academy of General Dentistry for promoting high standards of training and professionalism in the field of primary dental care and helping to address the treatment and prevention of oral health disease.
